title: CGPA
content: If I have a cgpa of 8.3 now excluding any special topics/internship credits, is it possible to get it to a 9 before graduation? I'm just asking if it's possible. I just started my 5th sem at the moment.

comments.body:
If you get 10 every semester you can get 9.06

(88\*8.3 +720)/160 = 9.06
